title: Sight of Solace
description: In a world where fated mates are bound by identical sets of eyes, Solace stumbles into a forbidden relationship with a tall honey-eyed male, who happens to be one of her closest friends. Advancing on to a new semester of classes in the capital, a classmate takes a special interest in her. This relationship forces her not only to uncover truths about her true identity but also to face the consequences of her mother's actions hidden by years of secrets.Her eyes, shrouded in mystery, hold the key to her destiny.Betrayed by those closest to her. Solace begins to wonder if thereâ€™s anyone in her life she can trust. Her story unfolds against the backdrop of a world on the brink of change with her choices potentially shaping the fate of both her personal life and those around her.
author: E.K. Pomfret
